comment: You realize the power of white-washing addiction is deep when you hear a Philly cop shoot off one of the "we got here cause Little Johnny was prescribed opioids for wisdom teeth" explanations at a community meeting.Um, no.Little Johnny was getting high...And always has been.

@VetsUnitedMarch @ravensspirit68 @BrookeM_Feldman You know, I've heard that 16k OD's in 2017 we from NSAIDs. Which is a wide class.But i can't find any proof to back this up.I wish I could.It would he great to show side-by-side.Although Rx's like:Vicoden - Hydrocodone &Percocet - Oxycodone....have Tylenol in it.
@BrookeM_Feldman It's part of the #GreatOpioidLie and it's doing nothing but harm.#StopStigma#OpioidsSaveLives
"Just take 2 Tylenol, go to bed, and QUIT COMPLAINING."https://t.co/1vqbLr68dm

@Bustn_Airs @ravensspirit68 @BrookeM_Feldman Wow, imagine all the folks that are taking 5&6 Tylenol a whack every 4hrs cz they can't get meds, some of which were on it in the past even&it allowed them sleep, bathe, socialize with family&friends, do daily activities, etc. Know tons who have to take a ton of Tylenol&NSAIDS
